description:
'''Rafael Ithier Natal''' (born 29 August 1926) is a Puerto Rican [[salsa music]]ian and the founder of the highly successful orchestra [[El Gran Combo]]. Ithier was born in [[Río Piedras, Puerto Rico|Río Piedras]], now a part of the municipality of [[San Juan, Puerto Rico|San Juan]].

In 2016, Ithier celebrated his 90th birthday and was interviewed by a news outlet in Puerto Rico about his contributions to Puerto Rican music.
